reviewText: Excellent purchase.  Item was new and delivered sooner than expected.
as good as remembered.  looked forward to seeing these during the television coverage of tournaments.  venturi had the ability to demonstrate and explain the techniques.

This is full of fast, easy lessons that help you understand how to hit a wide variety of shots.  The camera work is really good, and helps you see what Ken does and how the ball reacts.  A great tool for anyone looking to improve in the short game.
These DVD's are good to have. I enjoy watching them to help me take strokes off my game. The basic principles of golf never change and these DVD's are good to own.
